These people found love with us

With instant messaging, member feeds, dating diaries and more, there are plenty of ways to get to know some of our two million members!

ZARINA & WAYNE

I really didn’t think that I would ever find the happiness I have with Wayne, but I’m over the moon! Keep looking, don’t judge every book by its cover, you never know what you might find! I can’t imagine my life without Wayne now, and I can’t wait to start planning our wedding!

ADRIAN & TARA

Adrian and I met online in 2016 after both being on the site for several months. Both had been married before and had daughters so I sent him a wink to start with as I liked his smiley face, and his profile read well and sounded like someone I would get along with. He winked back within a couple of minutes and so we messaged for a couple of days before swapping numbers.

MAGY & TOM

I just want to say, I have found true love and the most: beautiful, amazing and wonderful woman, thanks to this site. I want to wish everyone the best of luck in finding theirs.

DAVE & TRACY

We have been dating for a couple of months and our now together exclusively. We are just taking things slowly at the moment as we are in a early stage of our relationship. To all of you on the site – hang in there! I was on the site for 7 months before I met Tracy and she had been on for a few months also. Good luck to you all and have a great 2016.
